Text:
Maybe you should get a batter basic understanding of Quantum Mechanics. 

Basically it IS theory of physics, science, parapsychology and other phenomena.

READ THE DESCRIPTION!:
This documentary explores these CONCEPTS in the context of new scientific IDEAS, such as string and membrane theory and quantum mechanics. And they also feature experts...who are EXPERTS.
Many thanks! Have been looking for this collection. :-D

Hm. People may think what they like - quantum mechanics makes that possible - but to me this documentary was a revelation. It explained quite clearly what I've noticed and thought for years about the nature of the world and myself. So ...
Thanx a lot, Friend
